name: Summon Night Gran-These: Horobi no Tsurugi to Yakusoku no Kishi
synopsis: Summon Night Gran-These is a spin-off of the popular ''Summon Night'' series. This game is an action RPG where you control both Lost and Millet as the journey through the world of Summon Night. A large part of this game is crafting, whether it be weapons or armor, as well as the signature staple of the series: Summoning.
